creator: axel@boxfuse.com
text:
This is highly problematic for the new executable Jars types of deployments like Spring Boot, as it effectively requires you to extract the KeyStore out of the Jar file, onto disk, to be able to pass it in.

This API should really be stream-based instead.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 56777 ***
